short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EngageGPT is a Chrome extension that allows you to use advantage of AI to engage in comments of posts on social media platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ChatGPT Chrome Extension that allows you to create engaging comments and save time.

Works with ChatGPT 3.5 & ChatGPT 4

Available social platforms: TikTok, LinkedIn, Instagram

Commenting doesn't have to be hard or take a lot of time! with EngageGPT, you can input the link you want to comment on and ChatGPT will give you the perfect comment!
Pick between 20 different tones and in any language!
